cause.description:
Everyone who join this should donate $1.00. With 50 people, that should get Nik two discs, which he both lost. In reality, he just go spend his money to do this, but I am nice. =)
1. Everyone deserves a disc.
2. Everyone descerves to be happy.
3. Everyone deserves a second chance.
cause.mission: Raise enough money to replace Nik's two discs
cause.name: Nik Lingle Lost a Disc
